data.name: Harambe.App
data.description:
Harambe App is a decentralized platform completely focused on making donations towards highly endangered animals such as gorillas. 

A token completely focused on donations and giving back. Harambe's goal is to make the world a better place while having fun in the process! Aiming to honor and remember the legacy of the great gorilla by the name of Harambe and recognize the good in those beautiful creatures closest to the human race. 

Tokenomics:

Utilizing the RFI concept that re-establishes DeFi yield generation. At it’s core, RFI charges a 1% transaction fee and re-distributes that fee to existing RFI holders. We have slightly modified the model to a 3% transaction fee, where 1.5% of the transaction fee get’s re-distributed to existing RFI holders and the additional 1.5% will be automatically transferred into the charity wallet. The fee collected to the charity wallet will be used along side additional community and team donations on community charity drives.

Token Max Supply: 100,000,000 (MAX)
PanCakeSwap Liquidity: 42,500,000 (42.5%)
Development Wallet: 7,500,000 (7.5%)
Charity Wallet: 10,000,000 (10%)
Presale: 40,000,000 (40%)


Who are we?

We are Harambe.App, a decentralized and global community helping actively save the most endangered animals in the world through community donations and through the automatic 1.5% transaction fee which gets distributed to the charity wallet.


What is Harambe App, exactly?

A token completely focused on donations and giving back. Our goal is to make the world a better place while having fun in the process! We aim to honor and remember the legacy of the great gorilla by the name of Harambe and recognize the good in those beautiful creatures closest to the human race. Join us on our quest of saving endagered animals one token at a time!


How does $HARAMBE work?

1. Buy on PancakeSwap
2. Hold $HARAMBE and get rewarded! 1.5% of every transaction is distributed to all existing $HARAMBE shareholders instantly and automatically with no fees. Sit back and watch your holdings grow! An additional 1.5% of every transaction is automatically sent to the charity wallet.
3. As people will buy and sell $HARAMBE, with each transaction, a 1.5% fee is charged in $HARAMBE. The $HARAMBE fee is re-distributed to all existing $HARAMBE hodlers instantly and automatically, directly to their wallets! There are no fees for the distribution, just HODL; sit back and watch your holdings grow.
